biotools.summary: CRISPRpred(SEQ) is a method for sgRNA on-target activity prediction that leverages only traditional machine learning techniques and hand-crafted features extracted from sgRNA sequences. We compare the results of CRISPRpred(SEQ) with that of DeepCRISPR, the current state-of-the-art, which uses a deep learning pipeline.
